entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is mentioned as the one who gave Harry a warning last Monday. She is described as having beady, square-framed eyes.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the student who lost his temper in Professor Umbridge's class again.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as the one who is speaking to Harry and warning him about his behavior.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as the house that will lose points due to Harry's behavior.

entities.name: ravenclaws
entities.description: Ravenclaws are mentioned as a group of students who are curious about what Professor McGonagall and Harry are discussing.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall warns Harry Potter about his behavior.
Professor McGonagall takes points away from Gryffindor house due to Harry's behavior.
Harry Potter disobeys Professor Umbridge by losing his temper in her class again.
Gryffindor house is affected by Harry's behavior, resulting in the loss of points.
